title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery      Â                 Gap Cave   5 Photos  Gap Cave (formerly known as Cudjo's Cave) is one of over 30 caves found in Cumberland Gap National Historical Park. Ranger led tours of Gap Cave are offered throughout the year.          Hensley Settlement   8 Photos  The Hensley Settlement was once a thriving mountain community. Today the hand hewn chestnut and oak cabins stand in testament to the stories of the famillies who called these mountains home.          Forests and Flowers   11 Photos  The forests surrounding the historic Cumberland Gap and found throughout the park are a mosaic of sorts.  Broad green deciduous trees, dense groves of hemlock and rhododendron, and delicate wildflowers all can be found while exploring the many miles of hiking trails found in Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.            Wildlife   9 Photos  Wildlife abounds in the multitude of habitats found in Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.  Black bear, deer, bobcat, raccoon, elk, and numerous species of birds can be found roaming the park.          Landforms and Features   10 Photos  Cumberland Gap National Historical Park is characterized by its history and its rugged beauty.  Sheer cliffs, cool mountain streams, and fantastic landforms excite the senses and reward those that explore the park.          People and Activities   6 Photos  Adventure awaits for those that visit Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.  Special programs and activities are offered throughout the year and a wide range of activities provide opportunities to truly experience the park.
